channel.title: CVE Feed for Siemens -- Tecnomatix RobotExpert
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siemens -- Tecnomatix RobotExpert

item.title: CVE-2021-25670|2024-08-03T20:11:28.324Z -- siemens -- tecnomatix%20robotexpert
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Tecnomatix RobotExpert (All versions < V16.1). Affected applications lack proper validation of user-supplied data when parsing CELL files. This could result in an out of bounds write past the end of an allocated structure. An attacker could leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of the current process. (ZDI-CAN-12608)
